scripts.chromatic: # do nothing as we don't want Chromatic project token in here
scripts.test-storybook:ci: concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "http-server storybook-static -s --port 6006" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6006 && test-storybook --url http://127.0.0.1:6006 --coverage --junit --coverageDirectory ./sbcoverage"
scripts.test-storybook:test: wait 3000 && echo Starting Storybook tests... && (test-storybook --coverage || true) && echo Completed Storybook tests...
scripts.test-storybook:watch: concurrently --names "STORYBOOK,TEST" --hide HTTP --prefix-colors "blue,magenta" "storybook dev -p 6006" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6006 && wait 10000 && onchange -i -k src/**/* -- npm run test-storybook:test"
scripts.test-playwright:test: wait-on -d 4000 http-get://localhost:4000/add-product http-get://localhost:5000/health/ready && (playwright test --project chromium firefox webkit || true) && echo Test run report available at http://localhost:6007
scripts.test-playwright:watch: concurrently --names "REPORT,COMPOSE,TEST" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "http-server playwright-report -s --port 6007" "cross-env http_proxy=127.0.0.1:8888 https_proxy=127.0.0.1:8888 && docker compose -f ../compose.yaml --env-file ../compose.env up --watch" "onchange -i -k  src/**/* e2etests/**/* ../flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi/**/*.cs ../flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi/**/*.csproj -- npm run test-playwright:test"
